Z0000-0.question: Are you within normal limits?
Z0000-0.instructions: if patient is within normal limits , select true otherwise false

Z0000-1.question: Do you feel any Dizziness?
Z0000-1.instructions: if patient feels dizziness, select true otherwise false

Z0000-2.question: Do you feel any Chest pain?
Z0000-2.instructions: if patient is experiencing any chest pain, select true otherwise false

Z0000-3.question: Do you have an edema
Z0000-3.instructions: if patient has edema, select true otherwise false

Z0000-4.question: Do you have dependent edema
Z0000-4.instructions: if patient has any form of dependant edema, select true otherwise false

Z0000-5.question: Is there any Neck Vein Distention
Z0000-5.instructions: if patient has a Neck Vein Distention, select true otherwise false

Z0000-6.question: Do you feel any Peripheral Pulses
Z0000-6.instructions: if patient has any perpheral pulses, select true otherwise false

Z0000-7.question: Do you require Cap refills
Z0000-7.instructions: if patient requires cap refills, select true otherwise false

Z0000-8.question: Do you hear any sort of heart sounds
Z0000-8.instructions: if patient hears any sort of heart sounds, select true otherwise false

Z0000-9.question: Could you tell me when you had your Pacemaker inserted?
Z0000-9.instructions: If patient has provided with the insertion date select true otherwise false

Z0000-10.question: Could you tell me when you had you AICD inserted
Z0000-10.instructions: If patient has provided with the insertion date select true otherwise false

Z0000-11.question: Do you want to share any further comments?
Z0000-11.instructions: If patient has provided addition information then select true otherwise false
